quest.name: Mother's Boy
journal: The wounded Resistance fighter has a lot on his mind.
objectives: Deliver the bloody bandana to the Resistance fighter's mother in Ala Gannha.

dialogue.name: INJURED02652
dialogue.text: There is something I would ask of you, lasslad.

dialogue.name: INJURED02652
dialogue.text: I joined the Resistance against my mother's wishes. She awaits me back in my hometown.

dialogue.name: INJURED02652
dialogue.text: I'm lucky to still be here after that last battle and I don't want to take her love for granted anymore.

dialogue.name: INJURED02652
dialogue.text: Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf.

dialogue.name: INJURED02652
dialogue.text: And tell her that I said “Thank you.” I want her to know I understand why she objected to me joining the fight against the Empire.

dialogue.name: INJURED02652
dialogue.text: Please, deliver this bandana to Mother in Ala Gannha on my behalf. And tell her of my gratitude.

dialogue.name: SURVIVINGFAMILY02652
dialogue.text: Wh-Why, this is my boy's! Has something happened to him!?

dialogue.name: SURVIVINGFAMILY02652
dialogue.text: Thank heavens. He is still safe. I tried to dissuade him from joining the Resistance, but he would not listen. We had a big fight and he wound up sneaking out in the dead of night.

dialogue.name: SURVIVINGFAMILY02652
dialogue.text: It is a weight off my mind to learn that he does not resent me. However, the fact he has returned this bandana must mean he intends to continue fighting.

dialogue.name: SURVIVINGFAMILY02652
dialogue.text: If his resolve is truly that strong then there is little chance of me convincing him to come home. I will continue to pray for his safe return.
